attributes.action: BOYRACERS AND VERY LOUD EXHAUST SYSTEMS WHICH ARE NONE LEGAL
attributes.additional_details: THERE ARE AN EVER INCREASE IN THE NUMBER OF `BOYRACERS` WHO CAUSE A NOISE ISSUE DAY AND NIGHT, THEY CHANGE THERE EXHAUST SYSTEM TO LARGE BORE AND TO AVOID THE MOT TEST CHANGE THEM TO A NORMAL ONE AND THEN BACK AGAIN, IT IS AN OFFENCE TO MAKE A CAR LOUDER THAN WHEN MADE WHICH IS THE CASE, THEY WAKE OR KEEP PEOPLE AWAKE AT NIGHT YET THERE ARE TOUGH NOISE LAWS FOR PROPERTY, THE POLICE SEEM TO FAIL IN EITHER TAKING THEM OFF THE ROAD WHICH THEY CAN OR GIVING THEM A SECTION 59 I THINK WHICH MAKES THEM CHANGE IT, OLD PEOPLES HOMES HAVE COMPLAINED WHERE WE ARE ON THIS ISSUE.
